bio.name: Cormac Greaney
bio.about: 4th year Computer Systems student at University of Limerick, passionate about full-stack development, machine learning, and creating innovative web experiences. Creator of Greanium OS. Starting Masters in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning at UL in 2026.

experience.title: Co-op Software Developer
experience.description: Work placement as part of university co-op program, gaining hands-on experience in software development within an automotive industry environment.

projects.name: Greanium OS
projects.description: A personal web-based operating system interface combining portfolio, file management, and terminal functionality.

projects.name: Cheer's N' Beer's Web App
projects.description: A web application for beer enthusiasts.

projects.name: 3DS Max U.S. Capitol Building
projects.description: 3D modeling and animation project of the U.S. Capitol Building.

projects.name: Deep Q-Network for Atari Pong
projects.description: Implementation of a Deep Q-Network (DQN) for Atari Pong using Gymnasium and Arcade Learning Environment (ALE). Part of University of Limerick CS4287 Neural Computing module. Trained an agent to master the classic Pong game through reinforcement learning.

projects.name: Image Segmentation with VGG16-based U-Net
projects.description: Image segmentation project using a VGG16-based U-Net architecture on the Oxford-IIIT Pet Dataset. Developed as part of CS4287 Neural Computing Assignment 1. Implemented convolutional neural networks for semantic segmentation tasks.

projects.name: QuizLive
projects.description: Full-stack web application for hosting and participating in live quiz games. Built with Java backend and TypeScript frontend, featuring real-time interactions and game management capabilities.

blog.title: Welcome to Greanium OS
blog.excerpt: Introducing my personal operating system interface...
blog.content:
# Welcome to Greanium OS

This is my personal web-based operating system...
